synopsis.text:
It was just another day for Tsuyoshi, rushing to make it to school on time, when he stumbled upon a heartwarming sight: a young girl trying to rescue a kitten stuck high up in a tree. This girl, Ai Minamizato, had been harboring secret feelings for Tsuyoshi for quite some time. As he steps in to save the day, Tsuyoshi inadvertently becomes the hero in Ai's eyes.

However, high school romance is never as simple as it seems. When Ai discovers that Tsuyoshi has received an anonymous love letter, she faces a dilemma. With the help of her vivacious friend Miyuki, Ai devises a plan to spend some quality time with Tsuyoshi. Little does she know, the love letter was just a prank orchestrated by Tsuyoshi's mischievous friend Minoru.

As the story unfolds, this chance encounter between Tsuyoshi and Ai could potentially blossom into something beautiful. Will this fateful meeting bring the two lovebirds together, or will the meddling of their friends lead to a series of comedic misunderstandings? Only time will tell in this endearing tale of young love and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
